Plot: B-movie legend, actress Debbie Wilkins, has just been replaced by a 23 yr old scream queen in her lovers bed. More importantly she's been left out of her lovers new film. Debbie doesn't take rejection well.
Title: Axe to Grind
Writer: George O Gomez (additional material), J.P. Linde (additional material), Scott C. Sanford, Scott C. Sanford
Actors: Debbie Rochon, Guy Torry, Matt Gulbranson, Paula Labaredas
